Address.value: 199 GRANDVIEW ROAD,SKILLMAN, SKILLMAN, New Jersey, 08558, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kenvue Inc. , the world's largest pure-play consumer health company by revenue, will begin trading today on the New York Stock Exchange in connection with its initial public offering ("IPO"). Chief Executive Officer and Director, Thibaut Mongon, and members of the Kenvue Leadership Team will celebrate by ringing the Opening Bell.
